sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 47-7E-2 - Recompiled
sections.text:
History:Laws 2013, ch. 122, § 1; recompiled as § 47-16-1 NMSA 1978.

Compiler's notes.— Laws 2013, ch. 122, §§ 1 through 14, the Homeowner Association Act, effective July 1, 2013, were erroneously compiled as 47-7E-1 through 47-7E-14 NMSA 1978, and have been recompiled as 47-16-1 through 47-16-14 NMSA 1978 by the compiler.
